editItem.title: Edit item
editItem.updateTitle: Update title to current page title

errorMsg.invalidTags: Tags can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens and Chinese characters.
errorMsg.pageAlreadyExists: Page has already been in the page list.
errorMsg.currentPageURLError: Failed to get current page URL.

panination.label: Pagination
panination.description: Control the number of items displayed per page

showBadge.label: Show badge
showBadge.description: Display item count on the extension icon

duplicatedUrlOpened.label: When opening duplicated tabs
duplicatedUrlOpened.description: Control the behavior when attempting to open an already opened tab

faviconSource.label: Favicon source
faviconSource.description: Select service to fetch website favicons

faviconCache.label: Cache favicons
faviconCache.description: Cache website favicons to improve loading speed and save bandwidth

clear.label: Clear favicon cache
clear.permissionMissing: Missing permission to cache favicons, try enable it by manual.

local.title: Local Storage
local.description: Export your reading list to a JSON file or load from a JSON file.

cloud.title: Cloud Storage
cloud.description: Configure cloud storage to sync your list across different devices.

browser.title: Browser Data
browser.description: Manage extension data stored in the browser.

message.permissionDenied: Permission denied to access cloud storage, please grant permission.

load.description: Select a backup point from the cloud WebDAV server.

confirmDelete.title: Sure to delete this entry?
confirmDelete.description: This will permanently remove the backup file from WebDAV.

confirmClear.title: Confirm clear data?
confirmClear.description: This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution. Note: This does not include data exported to local storage and cloud storage.

about.title: @:option.title
about.description: A light web browser extension to manage your read-it-later list easily.
about.privacy: This extension does not collect users' article contents or browsing history; saved items are stored locally only.
